QuestData.Title: Guess Whose Back
QuestData.Description: <This dragon turtle's massive shell is rock-hard and covered in sharp ridges. One of the locals could almost certainly make use of it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Krosh's Back to Yan in New Cifera.
QuestData.RewardText: My MY now look at THIS! What a beautiful shell!$B$BYou were wise to bring this to me, my friend. It will make a fantastic serving platter.$B$BPlease, take this for your troubles.
